channel.title: Hunter should be able to Mark Self
channel.description: Just saying as Hunter you should be able to mark someone to yourself if you know you are going to die. Was pretty upset when I marked the someone to myself and I died. (I marked scorned) but you should be able to mark someone to yourself

item.title: Hunter should be able to Mark Self
item.dc:creator: Sam17z
item.description:
So… let’s actually make this a thing where you know the person visiting you is scum and you want to kill them but cant

Read full topic
item.source: Hunter should be able to Mark Self
